reviewText: After hearing Dr. Lennox at the University of Texas as a member of the hosting group I was duly impressed with his presentation and wanted to read and hear more.  In addition I met Dr. Lennox's younger brother and family in Northern Ireland in the early 70s,
This is a riveting DVD which underscores the necessity of God and faith to uphold morality and society. Very well done and excellent condition; received expeditiously.
